resources.string:
Barrio Tournón, Edificio 
Consultécnica, 3er Piso 
San José, Costa Rica
(506) 2221 8320

Stateside\'s Mobile Night will be an event experience featuring talks from Costa Rica’s mobile industry thought leaders, great music, and many other surprises. Meet with like- minded developers for engaging conversations, discover new ideas to push the mobile world forward, and learn how you can be part of our team at Stateside.

Stateside is a creative & technical digital agency. We provide efficient, premium scalable production services through co-location of resources in U.S. and Costa Rica. We tailor our relationships to address our clients’ needs from project work to retained teams and everything in between.\n\nAt Stateside we are committed to achieve our clients\' digital goals. Our job as a company is to be strategically aligned with our partners. Our team of forward thinking individuals will morph, flex and bend to accommodate as necessary to reach the right solution and complete incoming projects.
Please fill the following info to participate in our Mobile Night’s raffle. Amazing prizes are waiting for you!
* In order to win a prize you must be attending to the event.\n* You will need your ID to claim your prize in case you win.
